videos.title: Incredibles 2 Official Teaser Trailer
videos.description:
The teaser trailer for Incredibles 2 is here.

Disney/Pixar's Incredibles 2 opens in theatres in 3D June 15th, 2018.

Everyone’s favorite family of superheroes is back in “Incredibles 2” – but this time Helen (voice of Holly Hunter) is in the spotlight, leaving Bob (voice of Craig T. Nelson) at home with Violet (voice of Sarah Vowell) and Dash (voice of Huck Milner) to navigate the day-to-day heroics of “normal” life. It’s a tough transistion for everyone, made tougher by the fact that the family is still unaware of baby Jack-Jack’s emerging superpowers. When a new villain hatches a brilliant and dangerous plot, the family and Frozone (voice of Samuel L. Jackson) must find a way to work together again—which is easier said than done, even when they’re all Incredible.
 
Directed by Brad Bird (“Iron Giant,” “The Incredibles”) and produced by John Walker (“The Incredibles”) and Nicole Grindle (“Sanjay’s Super Team” short, “Toy Story 3” associate producer), “Incredibles 2” busts into theaters on June 15, 2018.

videos.title: Sanju | Official Trailer | Ranbir Kapoor | Rajkumar Hirani | Releasing on 29th June
videos.description: Few lives in our times are as dramatic and enigmatic as the saga of Sanjay Dutt. Coming from a family of cinema legends, he himself became a film star, and then saw dizzying heights and darkest depths: adulation of die-hard fans, unending battles with various addictions, brushes with the underworld, prison terms, loss of loved ones, and the haunting speculation that he might or might not be a terrorist.Sanju is a hilarious and heartbreaking exploration of one man’s battle against his own wild self and the formidable external forces trying to crush him. It depicts the journey of a man through everything that life can throw at him. Some true stories leave you thinking “did this really happen?” This is one such unbelievable story that happens to be true.Starring: Ranbir Kapoor, Paresh Rawal, Manisha Koirala, Anushka Sharma, Sonam Kapoor, Dia Mirza, Vicky Kaushal, Jim Sarbh and Boman Irani.  Directed by: Rajkumar Hirani. videos.title: Rangasthalam Official Teaser | Ram Charan | Samantha | Aadhi | DSP | Sukumar | #RangasthalamTeaser
videos.description:
Rangasthalam Official Teaser / Rangasthalam Telugu Movie Teaser on Mythri Movie Makers. #Rangasthalam 2018 Telugu Movie ft. Ram Charan, Samantha and Aadhi Pinisetty. #Rangasthalam1985 is Directed by Sukumar and Music composed by DSP / Devi Sri Prasad. Produced by Naveen Yerneni, Y Ravi Shankar and Mohan Cherukuri under Mythri Movie Makers banner. #RangasthalamTeaser

#Rangasthalam1985 also ft. Anchor Anasuya, Jagapathi Babu, Gauthami & others. Pooja Hegde will be seen in a special song. 

#RamCharan #Samantha #Sukumar #PoojaHegde #Rangasthalam1985Teaser #SamanthaRuthPrabhu #AadhiPinisetty #DSP #DeviSriPrasad #Anasuya #JagapathiBabu

Rangasthalam Movie Details :
Cast : Ram Charan, Samantha, Aadhi Pinisetty, Prakash Raj, Jagapathi Babu, Anasuya Bharadwaj
Director : Sukumar
Music : Devi Sri Prasad / DSP
Producers : Naveen Yerneni, Y Ravi Shankar and Mohan Cherukuri
Banner : Mythri Movie Makers
DOP : R. Rathnavelu
CEO : Cherry
Editor: Naveen Nooli
Art Director : Rama Krishna Monika
Fights : Ram - Laxman
Lyrics : Chandrabose
Writers : Thota Srinivas, Kasi Vishal, Buchi Babu Sana, Srinivas Rongali

R Rathnavelu who has worked for super hit movies like Kumari 21F, Chiranjeevi Khaidi No 150, Mahesh Babu 1 - Nenokkadine, Rajinikanth Robo is the DOP for Rangasthalam.

After Rangasthalam, Ram Charan will be working with Boyapati Srinu. Apart from acting, Ram Charan is producing Chiranjeevi's Sye Raa Narasimha Reddy movie which will be directed by Dhruva movie fame Surender Reddy.

Mythri Movie Makers is also producing Savyasachi movie ft. Naga Chaitanya, Nidhhi Agerwal, R Madhavan, Bhumika Chawla and Dishita Sehgal, under Chandoo Mondeti's direction. MM Keeravani is composing the music for #NC15. The first look poster was unveiled on August 16, 2017.

Here is something to know about Ram Charan:
Ram Charan's paternal uncle Pawan Kalyan, was recently seen in Agnyaathavaasi Telugu movie, besides being active in Politics with his Janasena Party. Ram Charan's father, Tollywood's top actor, Chiranjeevi, has also played an important role in the AP Politics with his Prajarajyam party. Actor Chiranjeevi is now a member of the Congress. Ram Charan's wife Upasana Kamineni is the granddaughter of Dr.Pratap C Reddy, the founder and chairman of Apollo Hospitals.

Here is something to know about Samantha:
Samantha Akkineni (Samantha Ruth Prabhu), the female lead in Rangasthalam Telugu Movie recently tied the knot with Actor Akkineni Naga Chaitanya, the eldest son of Akkineni Nagarjuna. Samantha started her own NGO, Pratyusha Support, to provide medical support for women and children. She is the ambassador for Telangana Handlooms, having been appointed by the government of Telangana. 

Here is something to know about Aadhi Pinisetty:
Aadhi Pinisetty, the son of popular director Raviraja Pinisetty, had worked with Mega Heroes like Pawan Kalyan and Allu Arjun for Agnyaathavaasi and Sarrainodu respectively. The popular South Indian actor is also known for his remarkable performances in Nani's Ninnu Kori, Gundello Godari, Vaishali and other films.

Here is something to know about Jagapathi Babu:
Jagapathi Babu had earlier worked with Sukumar for NTR's Nannaku Prematho and garnered great applause for his performance. The Rangasthalam actor is also playing a vital role in Chiranjeevi's 151st film Sye Raa Narasimha Reddy.

Here is something to know about Devi Sri Prasad:
Devi Sri Prasad, aka DSP, is one of the best music composers in Tollywood. He had recently worked for Nani's MCA: Middle Class Abbayi, Jr NTR's Jai Lava Kusa, Chiranjeevi's Khaidi No.150 and many more. The latest album to come from DSP after Rangasthalam is Mahesh Babu and Koratala Siva's untitled project #Mahesh24 / #SSMB24

Here is something to know about Sukumar:
The captain of the Rangasthalam ship, director Sukumar has given the top Tollywood actors a huge blockbuster. Nannaku Prematho with NTR, 1 Nenokkadine with Mahesh Babu, Arya with Allu Arjun and 100% love with Naga Chaitanya to name a few.

Click here to watch:

Savyasachi First Look Motion Teaser:: http://bit.ly/2F7O34t

Siva Koratala Super Hit Movies: http://bit.ly/2DBdLSi

Rangasthalam Movie Updates: http://bit.ly/2DzAlL3

Ram Charan Birthday Celebrations: http://bit.ly/2BpLYi1

DSP Hit Songs: http://bit.ly/2n5Uk9e

videos.title: Sanju | Official Teaser | Ranbir Kapoor | Rajkumar Hirani
videos.description:
Few lives in our times are as dramatic and enigmatic as the saga of Sanjay Dutt. Coming from a family of cinema legends, he himself became a film star, and then saw dizzying heights and darkest depths: adulation of diehard fans, unending battles with various addictions, brushes with the underworld, prison terms, loss of loved ones, and the haunting speculation that he might or might not be a terrorist.

Sanju is in turns a hilarious and heartbreaking exploration of one man’s battle against his own wild self and the formidable external forces trying to crush him. It depicts the journey of a man through everything that life can throw at him. Some true stories leave you thinking “did this really happen?” This is one such unbelievable story that happens to be true.

Starring: Ranbir Kapoor, Paresh Rawal, Manisha Koirala, Anushka Sharma, Sonam Kapoor, Dia Mirza, Vicky Kaushal, Jim Sarbh and Boman Irani. 
 
Directed by: Rajkumar Hirani. 
 
Produced by: Vinod Chopra Films and Rajkumar Hirani Films in association with Fox Star Studios.

videos.title: DJ (Duvvada Jagannadham) 2017 New Released Full Hindi Dubbed Movie | Allu Arjun, Pooja Hegde
videos.description:
Duvvada Jagannatham Sastry is a small town Shaiva Brahmin Pujari boy who goes against all odds and helps others. Seeing this quality of his, a high-profile cop asks him to become DJ, a man who fights crime in disguise. This is the same time when Jagannatham falls in love with Pooja the daughter of a high profile minister involved with yet another crime lord Royyala Naidu who also operates in disguise. On the other hand, DJ decides to take on Royyala Naidu in his mission but does not know who he is in actual life. Rest of the story is as to how Duvvada Jagannadham alias DJ manages to finish Royyala Naidu.

Movie:- DJ (Duvvada Jagannadham)
StarCast:- Allu Arjun, Pooja Hegde, Murali Sharma
Directed By:- Harish Shankar
Music By:- Devi Sri Prasad
